scripts.deploy:test: node build.js --test && graph build && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ Ideamarket/IdeamarketTEST
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: node build.js --rinkeby && graph build && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ Ideamarket/IdeamarketRINKEBY
scripts.deploy:mainnet: node build.js --mainnet && graph build && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ Ideamarket/Ideamarket
